title: THOUGHT / COACH PHYSICAL INSTRUMENT
description: Physical Instrument is really adamant about yelling at you. something-something triggers the thought

dialogueTree.title: Physical Instrument: "Son, you've really let yourself go..."
dialogueTree.text: Son, you've really let yourself go -- it's a disgrace. But Coach Physical Instrument is going to get you back in prime condition. Even if it takes a million push-ups!

links.title: You: "Coach Physical Instrument? Does tha..."
links.text: Coach Physical Instrument? Does that mean you'll call me a maggot and a nancy-boy to motivate me?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Does a master swordsman insult his..."
links.text: Does a master swordsman insult his own blade? No! I'm going to turn you into an athletic bench-mark, you big pussy!

links.title: You: "Yes sir! Forge me into organic stee..."
links.text: Yes sir! Forge me into organic steel, coach!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It's going to take blood, sweat, pi..."
links.text: It's going to take blood, sweat, piss, and tears, but when I'm done with you, boy, you will be a Master Athlete!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "When a man sets his mind and body o..."
links.text: When a man sets his mind and body on something and gives his hundred and ten percent, he is sometimes going to piss himself. It just happens. No shame in that.

links.title: You: "Let's do this, coach, I'm with you!..."
links.text: Let's do this, coach, I'm with you! (Opt in.)

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Behold, world -- here walks a sport..."
links.text: Behold, world -- here walks a sportsman, hands chalked and hair kept back with a bandana. The *homo athleticus!*.

links.title: You: "Too much abuse for my taste. I'm mo..."
links.text: Too much abuse for my taste. I'm more of an intellectual. (Opt out.)

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Attention, attention! An old has-be..."
links.text: Attention, attention! An old has-been giving up! Come see the has-been quitting again, everyone!
